v8:item.v8:content: Date the text message was composed.
User who composed the text message.
User responsible for handling the text message.
List of text message recipients. Displayed in document list.
Interaction this Text message is based on.
A text message's subject is composed automatically of the first three words of the message body.
Indicates whether to convert Cyrillic letters to Latin letters.
The content of the text message.
Aggregated delivery status of all text messages.
Date when the message will be sent automatically.
Latest date the message can be sent.
String representation of the text message Recipient.
Phone Number in the following format: +xx (xxx) xxxxxxx.
Phone Number converted into the following format: +xxxxxxxxxxxx.
Message ID assigned by the SMS Provider. With ID, you can request the text message delivery status.
Text of an error reported by the Provider.
Indicates whether the text message was delivered to the Recipient.

A number that corresponds to a set of rows in the Access value sets table. Access values with the same set number are checked using logical AND, while access values with different set numbers are checked using logical OR.

Properties.Name: AccessValue
Properties.Comment: Empty values must be allowed to avoid errors when writing objects to be checked

v8:item.v8:content: A reference to a company, counterparty, etc.
Refines an Access value: • For a metadata object ID, it specifies the verification: If null reference, "Update"; otherwise, "Read". • For a rights owner, it specifies the table to select rights from.
Use numbered sets to verify right to Read.
Use numbered sets to verify right to Edit.
Text of the additional String attribute.
